Uses of Class
remodel.meta.Operation

Packages that use Operation 
Package Description
remodel.expr
Metamodel components to represent ReMoDeL expressions.
remodel.meta
Metamodel components to represent ReMoDeL models, metamodels and transformations.

  • Uses of Operation in remodel.expr

    Methods in remodel.expr that return Operation 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Operation CompoundExpression.getOperation()
    Returns the Operation or Rule owning this CompoundExpression.
    Operation Expression.getOperation()
    Returns the Operation or Rule owning this Expression.
    Methods in remodel.expr with parameters of type Operation 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void CompoundExpression.setOperation​(Operation executable)
    Sets the Operation operation owning this CompoundExpression.

  • Uses of Operation in remodel.meta

    Subclasses of Operation in remodel.meta 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  FunctionRule
    A FunctionRule is a helper-function computing an intermediate result.
    class  MappingRule
    MappingRule is a transformation rule that maps from a single source to a single target.
    class  MergingRule
    MergingRule is a transformation rule that maps from multiple sources to a single target.
    class  Rule
    Rule is is a kind of Operation representing an executable transformation rule.
    class  UpdatingRule
    UpdatingRule is a transformation rule that updates the source and returns this as the target.
    Methods in remodel.meta that return Operation 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Operation Variable.getOperation()  
    Methods in remodel.meta with parameters of type Operation 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Variable.setOperation​(Operation operation)
    Sets the Operation operation owning this Variable.
